post.body: Love Red Robin... wish we had one here!

arbor pertains more to trees, while a trellis pertains more to vines

nope, not yet
cant make any promises
Im bringing ashley, so therefore Im bringing cookies
r u bringing cookies tonight?
do u need any games? Cookies, etc... ?
u never answered my question yesterday, do u need us to bring anything?

yea thx, that is one of the main reasons that Im doing the physical/spiritual challenge again!
and @ashley166: I like eating cookies

Currently getting my groove on

Less than a week away from 24 hours of the Christmas Story! What's your favorite Christmas Movie?
Its my hair, I can get it as short as I want! Don't hate the player, hate the game
Just got my wife another Christmas present.... I love the World Wide Web
We are suppose to get dumped on by snow tomorrow, over a foot is expected... I love snow! but, I don't want school to be canceled!
